title: Huawei Nexus 6P (2015) – Everything you need to know | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexus 615]()**Related:[Android Pay vs ApplePay](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-pay-vs-apple-pay)****Nexus 6P (2015) price:**The Nexus 6P pricing is likely to be a serious issue of contention, mainlybecause it caused plenty of controversy last time around.Before 2014, the Nexus line-up was seen as a way to get pure Android on adecent smartphone without forking out half of your pay-cheque.However, last year’s [Nexus 6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review)changed all that, and saw Google adopt a new modus operandi of ravaging yourwallet.At £499, the Nexus 6 was the most expensive smartphone ever produced byGoogle, and ranked alongside pricey flagships like the iPhone 6 and Galaxy S5.The Huawei Nexus 6P (2015) is expected to be similarly high-end, and with topbill components comes a hefty R.R.P.It’s tough to pin down an exact price, but we’d be very surprised if Googlepeddled the Nexus 6 for anything less than £499.And if the handset ships with all the bells and whistles –[USB-C](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/usb-type-c-everything-you-need-to-know), fingerprint sensor, QHD screen – we could see that price risenorth of £599 too.**Share your thoughts on what you’d like to see from the Huawei Nexus 6P(2015) in the comments below.**
